long_description: The E-Case iSeries case seals any generation of iPhone, including iPhone 5, in reliable protection from moisture when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you view and use the touchscreen without removing device from the case. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage, so it remains transparent. SealLock closure helps ensure waterproof performance down to 1m for 30 min. E-Case iSeries case attaches to a kayak deck or pack straps using cords or clips (not included) and 2 corner lash points.
short_description: The E-Case iSeries case seals any generation of iPhone, including iPhone 5, in reliable protection from moisture when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water.
